definition: abbr. for Macao 澳門|澳门/abbr. for Australia 澳大利亞|澳大利亚

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

pinyin: Ao4 men2 Guo2 ji4 Ji1 chang3

definition: Provisional Municipal Council of Macau/Câmara Municipal de Macau Provisória
pinyin: lin2 shi2 Ao4 men2 shi4 zheng4 zhi2 xing2 wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 臨時澳門市政執行委員會

sentences.english: Gambling is prohibited outside the enclaves of Hong Kong and Macau.
sentences.chinese: 香港和澳門賽馬的外圍賭馬是被禁止的。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Macao Special Administrative Region shall be vested with independent judicial power, including that of final adjudication.
sentences.chinese: 第三條澳門特別行政區享有獨立的司法權和終審權。

sentences.english: Above prices are in MOP and are subject to 10% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 以上價目以澳門幣結算，需附加10%的服務費。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by Macau Inter-University Institute and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下資料由澳門高等校際學院提供，學生事務處代傳。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by the Macao Orchestra of ICM and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下資料由文化局澳門樂團提供，學生事務處代傳。

sentences.english: Appropriately, Maternity Bend follows Hospital Bridge. This too was named after a medical facility – Macau's Maternity Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 山頂醫院天橋之後是產房彎，以澳門的婦產醫院命名。

sentences.english: Photon Cannons, or the little hand thingies.
sentences.chinese: 光子炮，便是那個小手一律澳門新澳門賭場東西。

sentences.english: Photon Cannons, or the little hand thingies.
sentences.chinese: 光子炮，便是那個小手一律澳門新澳門賭場東西。

sentences.english: Macau is affluent but not for all people.
sentences.chinese: 澳門是富裕的城市，但貧富懸殊嚴重。
澳門立法院選舉開始投票。

sentences.english: The city of Macao, coextensive with the peninsula, is the capital. Population, 350,000.
sentences.chinese: 佔據整個澳門半島的澳門城是該地首府。

sentences.english: The city of Macao, coextensive with the peninsula, is the capital. Population, 350,000.
sentences.chinese: 佔據整個澳門半島的澳門城是該地首府。

sentences.english: The United States and the North Korean Government have reached understanding on the disposition of DPRK related funds frozen at Banco Delta Asia.
sentences.chinese: 美朝政府就澳門匯業銀行凍結朝鮮資金問題達成共識。

sentences.english: Presently bestselling inside and out of province, sells in distant markets of Macao, soon infiltrates the international market.
sentences.chinese: 現暢銷省內外，遠銷澳門，即將打入國際市場。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by the Macao Chinese Orchestra of ICM and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下資料由文化局澳門中樂團提供，學生事務處代傳。

sentences.english: The Kuan Im Temple(Guan Yin.Miao) in Macau was first build over 600 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 位於澳門的觀音廟始建於600年前。

definition: mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)
